Title: Get Your Steady Rest Aligned - YouTube

Title: Clever way to indicate a square part in a 4 jaw chuck - SUPER EASY !! - YouTube
Creator: Joe Pieczynski
Summary: This video shows an easy way of indicating the outside of a square part in a 4 jaw chuck without the need to continuously move your indicator. Take a look at this technique. It virtually eliminates the need to re-position the indicator for each side of your part.

Title: Holding wide plate material vertically on the mill - YouTube
